jd: From: Kartik Bhardwaj, Absolute IT kartik++++@absoluting.com Reply to: kartik++++@absoluting.com Name: Data Engineer Location: : Jersey City, New Jersey 3 days onsite as per client's availability in office.Ex- Accenture (Must have)Experience Required: 12+ yearsVisa: USC, GC, GC-EAD, H4-EAD, OPT-EAD Only (No H1B)Project Duration: 12 MonthsJob Description/Roles & Responsibilities:Ensure data is structured for accurate and efficient retrieval, storage, and analysis.Ability to create and optimize data models for integration, reporting, and analytics.Expertise in developing and maintaining taxonomies, metadata schemas, and data flow diagrams.Provide a clear framework for managing and accessing data consistently and easily.Knowledge of data governance, including quality management, stewardship, and compliance.Enable effective design, implementation, and management of data structures using appropriate tools.Good to have Databricks database knowledge.Good to have Data Engineering skill set.
